title: Instructional Program Utilizing Metacognitive Strategies for Physics Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental physics concepts and college-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical/legal/technical fields with beginner-level expertise in physics. Aims to acquire metacognitive strategies applicable to language pedagogy.

learning_goals: Learners can execute metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation) for physics problem-solving with over 80% accuracy
Learners can fully utilize metacognitive questions (Why? How?) when deriving connections between physics concepts
Learners can systematically reflect on learning strategies at least twice weekly through reflective journals in the LMS

resources: LMS platform (video, quiz, discussion board features)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
